Continuing to guide the construction of the new body, Megatron X smirked w=
ith satisfaction at the sound of the female's voice. "Soon, very soon, you =
shall stand tall before me. A body, fit and pure, made for your warrior spa=
rk." It would seem like mere moments later that the work was completed. The=
 work station slid aside, then the wall seperating the two Decepticons slid=
 the opposite way. Megatron X stepped forward to grasp the framework Holdin=
g Maxima in place, pulling it forward to allow her to take her first step i=
nto the lab.
=A0
The frame began to fall away, leaving her to stand on her =
own two feet before him.

--- On Wed, 10/28/09, Lady B <MaximaSR74@...>=
 wrote:


From: Lady B <MaximaSR74@...>
Subject: Re: Returning Home - a=
 new body
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, October 28, 2009, 1:3=
8 AM


=A0 





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com, "forevermegatron" <MaximaS=
R74@ ...> wrote:
>
> > =A0
> > "I am not the orginal Megatron, but I reason=
 just as good. First you must have a proper body, and I shall craft and for=
m it myself. COme, it will not do for you to remain so unguarded such as yo=
u are," the Decepticon stated, raising his arm to guide the spark back to t=
he medical bay. At this stage he could easily modify the intermediate body =
already under construction to something she would like.
> > =A0
> > "It has=
 been a long time since I had someone near I could trust," he stated, acces=
sing the console and began actively changing the sparkless body to what wou=
ld be the physical manifestation of the spark.
> > 
> > 
> 
> The fiery spa=
rk followed him to the Med Bay. Amazing how it could last so long without a=
 form but there was a determination, something unique about this spark. 
> =

> In the med bay... the form - nothing more than a jumbled mess of metal a=
nd parts - was coming along well enough. The spark hovered over the form as=
 though inspecting it. Silent for now as speaking took so much energy; draw=
ing that energy from it's surroundings in order to manifest. 
> As it hover=
ed over the face, distorted and incomplete, like a human skull without skin=
 or muscle. A slight movement and the spark shifted to hover over the torso=
 before it shot into and disappearing into the torso. A humming pulse as a =
bright glow eminated from the upper torso of the incomplete form. 
> 
> She=
 awaited for the new body to be completed. Ready for action, ready for life=
. The crimson optics flashed somewhat then pulsed. The vocalizer attempted =
to warm up as it attempted to speak. The crimson optics glowed brightly and=
 then remained steadily glowing, and finally... she spoke. 
"Uaahhhh," she =
sighed as though breathless, "I thank you." her volcalizer reverberated the=
 voice that was ever so familiar. A deep femme's voice in a wry sultry mali=
cious tone. It was the trademark voice of Maxima. 
"For so long have I soug=
ht to restore my spark to a proper body fit for a Decepticon," her words ex=
pressed in almost a slurred speech, as though exhausted. But she was able t=
o speak nonetheless. 
>
